statements: DELETE FROM imaging_data WHERE patient_id IN (SELECT id FROM patients WHERE age > 50) AND date_taken < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM ml_model WHERE model_name = 'Random Forest';
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_age > 60 AND patient_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM detections WHERE detection_result = false AND detection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM detections WHERE detection_date < '2021-10-01' AND detection_result = false;
DELETE FROM Diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 5 AND diagnosis_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Diagnoses WHERE patient_id = 50 AND diagnosis_date < '2022-01-01';
